name: CUBETHON (FurryExterminators)
description:
Welcome to CUBETHON. You play as a red square, moving through a white plane, dodging deadly gray squares. Use "A" to move left, "D" to move right. How long can you last, without falling off the edge? Play and find out!

This game was made with the help of Brackeys. Be sure to check him out: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA

Contact at: furryexterminatorsgames@gmail.com
